text: Nǐmen de zhǔ de gàojiè jiāng tōngguò nǐmen zhōng de yīrén jiànglín nǐmen, yǐbiàn tā jǐnggào nǐmen, nándào nǐmen duì cǐ gǎn dào jīngqí ma? Nǐmen dāng láojì, dāngshí, tā [ān lā] zài nǔ hā de zúrén hòu shǐ nǐmen chéngwéi jìrèn zhě, bìng cì gěi nǐmen kuíwú de shēntǐ, suǒyǐ, nǐmen dāng láojì ān lā [cìyǔ nǐmen] de ēnhuì, yǐbiàn nǐmen chénggōng.”
